name: negne0d

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(cneg(c0), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wne(c0, nat0), wne(cneg(c0), nat0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(cneg(c0), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wne(c0, nat0), wne(cneg(c0), nat0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wne(c0, nat0), wne(cneg(c0), nat0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(cneg(c0), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))

comment: The negative of a nonzero number is nonzero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
